text: Magdana's Donkey (, ) is a 1955 Georgian drama movie directed by Tengiz Abuladze and Revaz Chkheidze. It was based on the short story by Ekaterine Gabashvili. It stars Dudukhana Tserodze, Mikho Borashvili, Akaki Kvantaliani and Karlo Sakandelidze. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Georgian movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Tengiz Abuladze Category:Movies directed by Revaz Chkheidze
title: Magdana's Donkey
